definition: Tin Hau, Empress of Heaven, another name for the goddess Matsu 媽祖|妈祖[Ma1 zu3]/Tin Hau (Hong Kong area around the MTR station with same name)
Tin Hau MTR station (Eastern District, Hong Kong Island)

sentences.english: Actually, the hot feeling of love will cool down after 100 days.
sentences.chinese: 其实，爱情的致热期会在100天后开始冷却。

sentences.english: The bacteria could be consistently cultured for at least 14 days without losing its virulence.
sentences.chinese: 青枯菌在连续培养14天后接种致病力不减。

sentences.english: After 21 days, the heart is already beating and pumping blood.
sentences.chinese: 21天后，他们的心脏已经能够跳动并输送血液。

sentences.english: After day 7, t he number of autophagic vacuoles began to diminish.
sentences.chinese: 第7天后施万细胞内自噬泡数量开始减少。

sentences.english: The restricted stock units will vest 30 days after his death.
sentences.chinese: 这些限制性股票将在沃瑟斯坦去世30天后授予。

sentences.english: Well, there will be a re-assessment in 60 days.
sentences.chinese: 60天后将会重新进行一次评估。

sentences.english: And since when did you start reading "gossip girl" blasts anyway?
sentences.chinese: 你是什么时候开始看八卦天后手机报了？

sentences.english: A water pipeline restored water 128 days later.
sentences.chinese: 直到128天后，一条运水管道建成。

sentences.english: After10 days of culture, the base of the stem began to expand.
sentences.chinese: 培养10天后罗汉果茎段的基部一端开始膨大。

sentences.english: It took eight days for her to be evacuated to the main hospital in Muzaffarabad.
sentences.chinese: 8天后她才被送到穆扎法拉巴德的主要医院。

sentences.english: There days after Rastus' disappearance, Mrs. Ramsay received an anonymous letter.
sentences.chinese: 拉斯特斯失踪3天后，拉姆齐太太收到一封匿名信。

sentences.english: A woman enjoys a walk through the snow near Friesenried in the southern German state of Bavaria.
sentences.chinese: 德国南部巴伐利亚州的居民在大雪天后外出散步。

sentences.english: Producers therefore bargained with her agent for a lower appearance fee.
sentences.chinese: 演出商纷纷开始砍价，降低天后出场费。

sentences.english: Non-govenment anti-corruption website "I bribe" permanently closed after 20 days re-opened.
sentences.chinese: 民间反腐网站“我行贿了”重开20天后永久关闭。

sentences.english: I know I can be diva-ish sometimes, but I have to be in control.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我可以天后十岁上下有时，但我必须控制。

sentences.english: This is how the stuff looks after 10 days…
sentences.chinese: 这是10天后山茱萸混合物的样子。

definition: one week/all the way around/a whole cycle
separated in time (usu. followed by a quantity of time)
